src:
Alyi se je na odru pripetila nesreča
Na koncertu na Vrhniki ji je spodrsnilo na kablih. Obiskovalci so mislili, da je vse skupaj del koreografije.
01 Nov 2019, 08:22 by A. K.



Na koncertu na Vrhniki ji je spodrsnilo. FOTOGRAFIJI: KLEMEN BATAGELJ



Za svojo ekipo pravi, da je kot njena druga družina.


Alya v zadnjem letu navdušuje tako slovensko kot hrvaško javnost, tokrat s skladbo Spet zaljubljena. Pevka je te dni izjemno zaposlena s koncerti, ki so vedno nekaj posebnega, nedavno pa se ji je na nastopu na Vrhniki pripetila nezgoda, ki se je bo spominjala še lep čas.»Na odru sem po nesreči padla, ampak ker sem se tako hitro pobrala, so ljudje potem povedali, da je bilo videti kot neke vrste koreografija, spodrsnilo mi je namreč na enem od kablov,« se nesreče v smehu spominja simpatična pevka, ki se že pospešeno pripravlja na promocijo videospota pri naših južnih sosedih.Sicer pa je glasbenica v minulem mesecu priredila nekaj nepozabnih koncertnih dogodkov, katerih zaščitni znak je postala dnevna soba, njena ekipa namreč s sabo na prizorišče pripelje lestence, sedežno garnituro, knjige, preprogo – vse z namenom, da občinstvu pričara domače in udobno vzdušje. Tudi sicer so njeni koncerti vedno nekaj posebnega, z ekipo so postali uigran tim, Alya pa ob tem pravi, da so njeni bližnji sodelavci kot njena druga družina.


Za svojo ekipo pravi, da je kot njena druga družina.
text:
Alyi had an accident on stage
At a concert in Vrhnika, she slipped on cables. Visitors thought it was all part of the choreography.
01 Nov 2019, 08:22 by A.K.



At a concert in Vrhnika, she slipped. PHOTOS: KLEMEN BATAGELJ



She says of her team that she is like her other family.


Alya has been impressing both Slovenian and Croatian public over the last year, this time with the song Again in Love. The singer is extremely busy these days with concerts, which are always something special, but recently an accident occurred on her performance at Vrhnika. then, people said, it looked like some kind of choreography, it slipped on one of the cables, "remembers the laughing accident with a sympathetic singer who is already getting ready to promote the video with our southern neighbors. Last month, the musician hosted some unforgettable concert events, the trademark of which became the living room, her team bringing chandeliers, seating, books, carpet to the venue - to give the audience a homey and comfortable atmosphere. Even though her concerts are always something special, they have become a team with the team, and Alya says that her close associates are like her other family.


She says of her team that she is like her other family.
